title: Mormon Pioneer National Historic Trail: Photos & Multimedia
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia             Photos & Multimedia         Martins Cove, WY National Park Service / NTSL  Most images displayed on the gallery page are National Park Service, royalty-free, unless noted. Their use is not limited; however, if you use any of these images for a media project, please credit "Photograph Courtesy of the National Park Service" where appropriate. If you would like more information about these images, or those courtesy of The Wagner Perspective, please e-mail the National Trails Intermountain Region in Salt Lake City.  Photo Gallery Virtual Tour
